jacdac.LedSingleCmd.Animate:
This has the same semantics as `set_status_light` in the control service.
* ```
const [toRed, toGreen, toBlue, speed] = jdunpack<[number, number, number, number]>(buf, "u8 u8 u8 u8")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.Color:
The current color of the LED.
* ```
const [red, green, blue] = jdunpack<[number, number, number]>(buf, "u8 u8 u8")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.LedCount:
Constant uint16_t. If known, specifies the number of LEDs in parallel on this device.
* ```
const [ledCount] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.LuminousIntensity:
Constant mcd uint16_t. The luminous intensity of the LED, at full value, in micro candella.
* ```
const [luminousIntensity] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.MaxPower:
Read-write mA uint16_t. Limit the power drawn by the light-strip (and controller).
* ```
const [maxPower] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). The physical type of LED.
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.LedSingleVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.LedSingleReg.WaveLength:
Constant nm uint16_t. If monochrome LED, specifies the wave length of the LED.
* ```
const [waveLength] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
modules.LedSingleClient: A controller for 1 or more monochrome or RGB LEDs connected in parallel.
modules.LedSingleClient.animate: Animates the LED to the given color. Leave speed to 0 to make the change instanuous.
modules.LedSingleClient.blue: The current blue channel of LED color.
modules.LedSingleClient.color: The current LED color as an 24bit RGB color
modules.LedSingleClient.green: The current green channel of LED color.
modules.LedSingleClient.ledCount: If known, specifies the number of LEDs in parallel on this device.
modules.LedSingleClient.luminousIntensit: The luminous intensity of the LED, at full value, in micro candella.
modules.LedSingleClient.maxPower: Limit the power drawn by the light-strip (and controller).
modules.LedSingleClient.red: The current red channel of LED color.
modules.LedSingleClient.setMaxPower: Limit the power drawn by the light-strip (and controller).
modules.LedSingleClient.waveLength: If monochrome LED, specifies the wave length of the LED.
